description: Changelings are subtle shapeshifters capable of disguising their appearance. Their ability to adopt other creatures' guises makes them consummate spies and criminals.
Changelings are masters of intrigue and deception, the perfect choice for a campaign that runs in the shadows.
name: Changeling
size description: Changelings are built much like humans, but a little leaner. Your size is {size}.
traits: As an action, you can polymorph into any humanoid of your size that you have seen, or back into your true form. However, your equipment does not change with you. If you die, you revert to your natural appearance.
